summary.span: 為監視追蹤和偵錯輸出的接聽程式提供 基底類別。

span.span: Provides the base class for the listeners who monitor trace and debug output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何實作的範例，請參閱，和類別。For examples of how to implement a , see the , and the classes. 您必須啟用追蹤或偵錯才能使用追蹤接聽項。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a trace listener. 下列語法是特定的編譯器。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果您使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 以外的編譯器，請參閱編譯器的文件。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要啟用偵錯 C# 中，加入`/d:DEBUG`旗標設為編譯器命令列，當您編譯程式碼，或者您可以加入`#define DEBUG`加入您的檔案頂端。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，加入`/d:DEBUG=True`編譯器命令列的旗標。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要啟用追蹤，在 C# 中的，加入`/d:TRACE`旗標設為編譯器命令列，當您編譯程式碼，或新增`#define TRACE`加入您的檔案頂端。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，加入`/d:TRACE=True`編譯器命令列的旗標。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. 若要加入追蹤接聽程式，請編輯對應到您的應用程式名稱的組態檔。To add a trace listener, edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在這個檔案中，您可以加入接聽程式、 設定其類型和其參數，移除接聽程式，或清除所有先前設定的應用程式的接聽程式。Within this file, you can add a listener, set its type and set its parameter, remove a listener, or clear all the listeners previously set by the application. 組態檔應該類似下列的範例格式化。The configuration file should be formatted similar to the following example. ```xml ``` 如需有關如何使用組態檔進行追蹤的詳細資訊，請參閱[ <system.diagnostics>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md)。For more information on using configuration files for tracing, see [<system.diagnostics>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md).

Inherit from this class to implement a custom listener for the and classes. At a minimum, you must implement the and methods. Additionally, you can implement the , and methods.

summary.span: 取得在應用程式組態檔中定義的自訂追蹤接聽程式屬性。

span.span: Gets the custom trace listener attributes defined in the application configuration file.

value.span: ，其中包含追蹤接聽程式的自訂屬性。

span.span: A containing the custom attributes for the trace listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別繼承自類別可以加入自訂屬性，藉由覆寫方法並傳回之自訂屬性名稱的字串陣列。Classes that inherit from the class can add custom attributes by overriding the method and returning a string array of custom attribute names. 屬性會識別應用程式的組態檔中所參考的自訂屬性。The property identifies the custom attributes that are referenced in the application's configuration file. 例如，在下列的組態檔摘錄參考自訂屬性"delimiter"。For example, in the following configuration file excerpt the custom attribute "delimiter" is referenced. 在此情況下，屬性會傳回包含字串"delimiter"。In this case, the property returns a containing the string "delimiter". ``` ``` 不會列舉未參考的自訂屬性。Unreferenced custom attributes are not enumerated. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。For more information, see the method.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, closes the output stream so it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法，當時輸出至檔案，例如。Use this method when the output is going to a file, such as to the . 之後呼叫這個方法時，您必須重新初始化的物件。After a call to this method, you must reinitialize the object.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫允許所使用的資源都重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需有關，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);

Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫這個方法，小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [總未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 清除。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding this method, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 取得及設定追蹤接聽程式的追蹤篩選器。

span.span: Gets and sets the trace filter for the trace listener.

value.span: 衍生自 基底類別的物件。

span.span: An object derived from the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤篩選可以加入追蹤接聽程式，提供一層的篩選之外，還提供追蹤來源的參數。A trace filter can be added to a trace listener to provide a layer of screening beyond that provided to the trace source by switches. 例如，可以加入至接聽程式來控制所輸出的事件類型的追蹤接聽程式。For example, the can be added to a trace listener to control the event types that are output by the listener. 稱為，因為參數符合準則的接聽程式可以查詢它們篩選器，如果有的話，若要判斷是否追蹤傳送至輸出。Listeners that are called because the switch criteria are met can query their filter, if present, to determine if a trace is to be sent to output. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來源篩選器加入主控台追蹤接聽項的屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property to add a source filter to a console trace listener. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#28)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#28)]

summary.span: 取得或設定縮排層級。

The indent level.
The default is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示的縮排所指定的次數屬性會套用。The property represents the number of times that the indent specified by the property is applied. 這個屬性會儲存每個執行緒/每個要求為基礎。This property is stored on per-thread/per-request basis.

summary.span: 取得值，指出追蹤接聽程式是否為安全執行緒。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the trace listener is thread safe.

value.span: 如果追蹤接聽程式是安全執行緒，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the trace listener is thread safe; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值用來判斷是否要寫入至接聽程式時，使用全域鎖定。The value of is used to determine whether to use a global lock when writing to the listener. 如果值是`false`的值為何使用全域鎖定。If the value of is `false`, the global lock is used regardless of the value of . 只有當不使用全域鎖定的值是`true`和值是`false`。The global lock is not used only if the value of is `true` and the value of is `false`. 預設行為是使用全域鎖定時寫入至接聽程式。The default behavior is to use the global lock whenever writing to the listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **請注意**所呼叫的方法和類別，設定屬性值設定為`false`以更新版本中，避免不必要的縮排。**Note** The method, called by the and classes, sets the property value to `false` to prevent later, unnecessary indents. 您必須設定屬性`true`每當您想要縮排追蹤輸出。You must set the property to `true` each time you wish to indent trace output.

param.span: 物件，包含目前處理程序識別碼、執行緒識別碼與堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.

param.span: 用來識別輸出的名稱，通常是產生追蹤事件的應用程式名稱。

span.span: A name used to identify the output, typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、資料物件與事件資訊至特定接聽程式的輸出。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object and event information to the listener specific output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼，但成員所呼叫， ，和類別來寫入追蹤輸出的資料。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code but by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output. 預設實作寫入`eventCache`， `source`，`eventType`和`id`頁首和頁尾的追蹤中的參數。The default implementation writes the `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType` and `id` parameters in the header and footer of the trace. `data`參數會寫入成為追蹤訊息的本文。The `data` parameter is written as the body of the trace message. `ToString`資料物件的方法用來轉換物件。The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a .

span.span: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.

param.span: 用來識別輸出的名稱，通常是產生追蹤事件的應用程式名稱。

span.span: A name used to identify the output, typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.

param.name: eventType
param.span: 其中一個 值，可指定引發追蹤的事件類型。

span.span: One of the values specifying the type of event that has caused the trace.

param.name: id
param.span: 事件的數值識別項。

span.span: A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: data
param.span: 要發出做為資料的物件陣列。

span.span: An array of objects to emit as data.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、資料物件的陣列與事件資訊至特定接聽程式的輸出。

span.span: Writes trace information, an array of data objects and event information to the listener specific output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼，但成員所呼叫， ，和類別來寫入追蹤輸出的資料。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code but by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output. 預設實作會寫入的值`source`，`eventType`和`id`參數做為標頭。The default implementation writes the values of the `source`, `eventType` and `id` parameters as a header. 資料物件會轉換成字串時，使用`ToString`每個物件的方法。The data objects are converted to strings using the `ToString` method of each object. `eventCache`資料會寫入做為頁尾時，所相依的值輸出資料的本質屬性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer, the nature of the output data being dependent on the value of the property.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤和事件資訊至特定接聽程式的輸出。

span.span: Writes trace and event information to the listener specific output.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、格式化的物件陣列與事件資訊至特定接聽程式的輸出。

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted array of objects and event information to the listener specific output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼，但成員所呼叫， ，和類別來寫入追蹤輸出的資料。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code but by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output. 預設實作會寫入的值`source`，`eventType`和`id`參數做為標頭。The default implementation writes the values of the `source`, `eventType` and `id` parameters as a header. `args`物件陣列會轉換成字串，使用方法，傳遞`format`字串和`args`要追蹤的訊息部分的格式字串陣列。The `args` object array is converted to a string using the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array to format the string as the message portion of the trace. `eventCache`資料會寫入做為頁尾時，所相依的值輸出資料的本質屬性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer, the nature of the output data being dependent on the value of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.TraceOptions TraceOutputOptions { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceOptions TraceOutputOptions
Public Property TraceOutputOptions As TraceOptions
public: property System::Diagnostics::TraceOptions TraceOutputOptions { System::Diagnostics::TraceOptions get(); void set(System::Diagnostics::TraceOptions value); };
member this.TraceOutputOptions : System.Diagnostics.TraceOptions with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定追蹤輸出選項。

span.span: Gets or sets the trace output options.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定追蹤輸出的選擇性內容。The property determines the optional content of trace output. 這個屬性可以在組態檔中或以程式設計方式在執行期間設定包含額外的資料，特別是針對一段程式碼。The property can be set in the configuration file or programmatically during execution to include additional data specifically for a section of code. 例如，您可以設定主控台追蹤接聽程式屬性將呼叫堆疊資訊加入至追蹤輸出。For example, you can set the property for the console trace listener to to add call stack information to the trace output. 列舉型別不是由下列類別和方法：The enumeration is not used by the following classes and methods: - 類別，因為它可能會造成大量的資料寫入至記錄檔。The class, because it can cause a large volume of data to be written to the log. - `Write`和`WriteLine`方法， ，和類別。The `Write` and `WriteLine` methods of the , , and classes. - 和方法類別時，它們不會在衍生類別中覆寫。The and methods of the class when they are not overridden in a derived class. ## Examples 下列範例示範的設定主控台追蹤接聽項的屬性。The following example shows the setting of the property for a console trace listener. 主控台追蹤接聽項是接聽程式中所列舉的其中一個追蹤來源的屬性。The console trace listener is one of the listeners enumerated in the property of a trace source. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#16)]

exception.span: 設定作業失敗，因為值無效。

span.span: Set operation failed because the value is invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼，但成員所呼叫， ，和類別來寫入追蹤輸出的資料。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code but by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output. 方法用於的相關的追蹤相互關聯。The method is used for the correlation of related traces. 方法呼叫方法來處理呼叫，eventType 層級設定為和`relatedActivityId`做為附加至訊息的字串。The method calls the method to process the call, with the eventType level set to and the `relatedActivityId` as a string appended to the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法將縮排，並重設屬性`false`。This method writes the indent and resets the property to `false`. 如果呼叫這個方法是`true`當您正在覆寫和方法。Call this method if is `true` when you are overriding the and methods. 根據預設，此方法會使用空格來縮排。By default, this method uses blank spaces for indentation. 縮排的大小取決於值和屬性。The size of the indent is determined by the values of the and properties. 屬性表示的次數所指定的大小的縮排屬性會套用。The property represents the number of times the indent of the size specified by the property is applied. 這個方法會呼叫和類別。This method is called by the and classes.

summary.span: 將訊息、分類名稱或物件的 方法的值寫入當您實作 類別時所建立的接聽程式，後面跟隨著行結束字元。

span.span: Writes a message, category name, or the value of an object's method to the listener you create when you implement the class, followed by a line terminator.

summary.span: 將分類名稱和訊息寫入當您實作 類別時所建立的接聽程式，後面跟隨著行結束字元。

span.span: Writes a category name and a message to the listener you create when you implement the class, followed by a line terminator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可能會實作典型的行結束字元是歸位字元後面接著程序換行字元 (\r\n)。The typical line terminator you might implement is a carriage return followed by a line feed (\r\n).
